headline: KULICKE & SOFFA K&S MANUAL BALL BONDER

specstable:
Manufacturer Kulicke & Soffa
Model 4524D
Description Manual Ball Bonder
Other Information

6 Channels,up to 200 programs, LCD Display
Bonding area: 6" x 6"
Throat dept: 5.6"
Gross table motion: 5.5"
Fine table motion: 0.55"
Z Motion system: DC servo/LVDT control
Z Travel: 9.1mm
Ultrasonic system

  • 60 kHz Transducer
  • Low power: 1.3W
  • High power: 2.5W
    Bond time:
  • Ball bonding/bumping: 20 to 200ms
  • Single point, TAB: 20 to 1000ms
  • Bond force: 10 to 160 gr
    Wire:
  • Gold 0.7 to 3.0 Mil
  • Spool: 2"
  • Wire feed 90°
  • Wire termination: clamp tear
    Modes of operation:
  • Semi-auto
  • Manual Z
  • Ball bonding
  • Single point TAB
  • Ball bumping
  • Coining


Ball formation: Negative EFO (N.E.F.O.)
Heated 2"x2" work holder
Targeting spotlight
